attributes.description:
Take on all of life's opportunities with this 4x4 7-Seater Toyota-Staple. If you're up for more of a challenge this Diff-Lock Ready machine is up trail-blazing, dunes or camping.
With a Touchscreen Display, Electric Seats and Hands-Free Multi-Media with a SUNROOF. Talk about sit back; relax (on your leather seat) and take on the world again.
All the vehicles that we place on Cars have gone through a rigorous mechanical inspection by one of our car experts as well. Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
